sense.name: contact with a pager or call over PA system
sense.examples: The doctor was paged for the code. Target pages customers to tell them when they're closing. Clients page him when they need his attention. John waited eagerly for his wife to page him.

sense.name: work as a page
sense.examples: He is paging in Congress this summer. She will page for a powerful politician for a year or so. I'm trying to get a job paging but it's a competitive market.

sense.name: number the pages of a book
sense.examples: The apprentice carefully paged the manuscript. Franklin paged his doctoral thesis. The editor paged the book correctly.

sense.name: flip or scroll through pages
sense.examples: The editor paged through the manuscript. He paged through the e-book on his Android.
